channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: India’s richest man wants to turn every TV into a PC
item.description: Jio Platforms, the digital arm of Reliance Industries, has launched a virtual desktop service called JioPC for televisions.

item.title: AI coding tools may not speed up every developer, study shows
item.description: Software engineer workflows have been transformed in recent years by an influx of AI coding tools, but However, a new study calls into question the ex...

item.title: Slumber Cloud’s Sale Is One Not to Miss Before Prime Day Ends
item.description: Slumber Cloud’s cooling sheets are the best we’ve tried to skip the night sweats. Don’t miss your chance to get them on sale.

item.title: Tesla reportedly close to starting sales in India
item.description: Tesla may finally start selling its EVs in India with a showroom slated for Mumbai.

item.title: The Best Anti-Prime Day Sales to Shop Before They're Over
item.description: Feeling anti-Amazon? These small businesses have sales you can shop right now before the week of sales ends.

item.title: 15 Prime Day Kindle Deals (Plus Amazon Echo Devices)
item.description: Amazon’s biannual sale event is the best time to shop for a Kindle e-reader, Echo speaker, and many more of Amazon’s own devices.

item.title: Can an ‘ethical’ spyware maker justify providing its tech to ICE?
item.description: Analysis: In calling itself an ethical spyware vendor, Paragon has opened itself up to scrutiny of its government customers.

item.title: 15 Best Amazon Prime Day Vacuum Deals for Dust and Dirt in 2025
item.description: Looking for a new cleaning gadget? Whether it's a Dyson or a dupe, we've found the best deals on vacuums during Prime Day.

item.title: AI leadership development platform Praxis Labs sells to Torch
item.description: Praxis Labs, a learning development platform, announced its acquisition on Thursday for an undisclosed amount by the leadership and coaching enterpris...

item.title: Samsung's New Phones Show How Far Ahead China Is on Innovation
item.description: Just like it has done with EVs, China’s investment in smartphones is leaving big brands playing catch up. Forget iterative updates: China is already w...
